import React from 'react' import '../Pages/styles.css' import '../App.css' const Service =(props) => { function handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault() if (e.target.value === "Schedule Delivery") { props.setService('Water tank fill') } if (e.target.value === "Schedule Clean") { props.setService('Water tank clean') } props.setFormStep(1) } return ( <>

Choose a service

We deliver water from our tankers to your home water tank ensuring you have drinking water, pool water and spa water all year round.

Learn more

We get inside your water tank to remove all contaminated water, scrub the walls and suck up and remove any sludge, sediment or dead animals.

Learn more
) } export default Service
